general_advisory: According to the District level weather warnings issued by MC Bhubaneswar, there is no heavy rainfall warnings for different districts under the West Central Table Land Zone of Odisha. Farmers are advised to postpone harvesting and spraying operations for some days.

advisory: Make arrangements to maintain sufficient water and drain out excess of stagnated rainwater from rice field.
Avoid irrigation and postpone harvesting and spraying operations for some days.
Keep the harvested produce in safe places.
Regular monitoring against different pests and disease should be advised.
Postpone all types of spraying and intercultural operations for some days.
Make provision to drain out excess water from the field to avoid lodging of plants.
Irrigation as well as chemical application is recommended in okra.
Farmers should make provision for proper drainage system.
Farmers should go for sowing and planting of Cole crop.
Make proper drainage channels in the field to drain out excess water.
Planting of new plants is recommended.
Chemical application should be done before the occurrence of rainfall.
